articles.title: Gift to Kim Il Sung from Swiss Committee
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Swiss Committee
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Il Sung from Swiss Committee 
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was presented with a gift by the Swiss Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
 The gift was conveyed to an official of the DPRK embassy in Bern by Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Swiss committee, on August 13.

Int'l Table Tennis Tournament Closes 
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The 19th Pyongyang International Table Tennis Invitational Tournament opened on Aug. 18 was closed with due ceremony at the Table Tennis Gymnasium in Chongchun Street, Pyongyang, on Monday.
 Present at the closing ceremony were Kim Yu Ho, chairman of the DPRK Table-Tennis Association, officials concerned, athletes, working people and youth and students in the city.    
 The results of matches in men and women's singles and doubles were announced there. The following are standings:

 Men's singles:
1. Kim Hyok Bong (DPRK)
2. Jang Song Man (DPRK)
3. O Il (DPRK)
Liu Zhongze (Singapore)    

 Women's singles:
1. Wen Jia (China)
2. Kim Hyang Mi (DPRK)
3. Kim Mi Yong (DPRK)
Chen Qing (China)    

 Men's doubles:
1. Ri Chol Guk and Ri Kwang Il (DPRK)
2. Zheng Changgong and Zhu Ziang (China)
3. Kim Hyok Bong and An Chol Yong (DPRK)
Jang Song Man and Kim Song (DPRK)    

 Women's doubles:
1. Chen Qing and Wen Jia (China)
2. Kim Hyang Mi and Kim Mi Yong (DPRK)
3. Ko Un Gyong and Ryom Won Ok (DPRK)

Cups and medals were awarded to successful players and technical prizes to ang Hyon Ae (DPRK), Zhu Ziang (China), Zhen Zhen (Jilin Province, China), Sun Beibei (Singapore) and Mohammadreza Akhlaghpasand (Iran).

Pak Pong Ju Meets Head of Chinese Delegation 
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju met and had a friendly talk with Chen Jian, assistant to the minister of Commerce, who is leading the Chinese government economic and trade delegation, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday. 
 On hand were Minister of Construction and Building-Materials Industries Tong Jong Ho, Vice- Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il, Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam, Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Wu Donghe, General Director of the Yaohua Glass Group Corporation of China Teng Fuquan, and other Chinese guests.

articles.title: Anniv. of Kim Jong Il's Visit to Far Eastern Region of Russia Observed
Day of Korea�fs Liberation Celebrated Abroad
S. Korean Political Party Delegation Here
articles.content:
Day of Korea�fs Liberation Celebrated Abroad
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks were held by the Misr Arab Socialist Party of Egypt and lectures were given at Guayaquil University of Ecuador, in the conference hall of the Zambian government, by the Nigeria-Korea Printing Industry Company and the Malabo Committee of the "Torch" youth organization of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and a reading session, a film show and an opening ceremony of a week-long photo exhibition were held  by the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute, the psychological faculty of Chambogo University of Uganda and the National Cultural Hall of Uganda from August 2 to 10 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
 On display at the photo exhibition were photos showing the anti-Japanese armed struggle led by President Kim Il Sung and the achievements made by the DPRK thanks to the Songun politics of leader Kim Jong Il.    
 Korean films dealing with the exploits Kim Il Sung performed by achieving Korea's liberation were shown at the film show. 
 Speakers at those functions said that Kim Il Sung led the anti-Japanese armed struggle, dealing crushing blows at the Japanese imperialists and liberating Korea, beat back the armed aggression by the U.S. imperialists and thus honorably defended the national independence and sovereignty and in the post-war period turned the DPRK into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defense.    
 Kim Jong Il has energetically led the building of a great prosperous powerful nation, foiling the moves of the U.S. to isolate and stifle the DPRK by pursuing the Songun politics, they noted, adding that Korean-style socialism is sure to triumph as long as there are his wise leadership and people united close around him.
 Meanwhile, a member of the Chamber of Deputies of the National Congress of Brazil on Aug. 17 addressing its plenary session warmly congratulated all the Korean people on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of Korea's liberation, expressing the belief that Brazil and its congress would make sustained efforts for the reunification of Korea, a homogeneous nation and a global symbol of dignity and defence of sovereignty.
 The chairman of the Peruvian Association for the Study of the Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk released a statement on Aug. 15 and Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Vanguard Party of Indonesia, issued a similar statement on Aug.12 on the same occasion.

articles.title: Zambian Government Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
S. Korean Political Party Delegation Here
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Democratic Workers' Party of south Korea led by its representative Kim Hye Gyong arrived here Tuesday at the invitation of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party.
 It was met at the airport by Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the KSDP Central Committee, and officials concerned.

articles.content:
Zambian Vice-President Calls on Yang Hyong Sop
    Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Lupando Mwape, vice-president of the Republic of Zambia, paid a courtesy call on Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
 On hand were the members of the Zambian government delegation and Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Kim Yong Suk, vice-minister of Agriculture, and officials concerned.
 A friendly conversation took place.
